Index.meta_title: DevPlot - A super fast developer portfolio builder
Index.meta_description: DevPlot is a super fast developer portfolio builder. It's a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to create a portfolio in minutes.

Dashboard.meta_description: Manage your websites and access various features.
Dashboard.no_portfolio: You don't have any portfolio sites yet.
Dashboard.create_portfolio_description: Start building your online presence with a professional portfolio

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Auth.terms: I accept the terms and conditions and privacy policy

Auth.sign_up_description: Join our community and start building your portfolio today.
Auth.data_privacy: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security
